mapping.sql:
select distinct TO_CHAR(P.JOBNO) || TO_CHAR(I.ITEMNO) || w.WORKORDER_NO AS "经典案例工单编号", (case when jt.jt_itemno is null then 'P2' else 'P1' end) as Object_type
from mod_workorder w, mod_jt_jobplan_item_relation jt, mod_workorder_tag_proc_info r, mod_attachment att, mod_jobplan_item i, CFG_JOBPLAN P where w.id = r.workorder_id and w.jobitem_id = i.id and p.id = i.jobplan_id and w.id = att.function_def_id2 and w.jobitem_id = jt.jobplan_item_id(+) and r.status = 1
and r.approve_time>= to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and r.approve_time < (to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')+1)

mapping.name: ${province_en}_WOCASELIST_${Object_type}_${经典案例工单编号}.CSV
mapping.sql: select '1.41_SP0' as "版本号", t.* from vrpt_woclassic t where t.经典案例工单编号='${经典案例工单编号}'

select TO_CHAR(P.JOBNO) || TO_CHAR(I.ITEMNO) || w.WORKORDER_NO AS "经典案例工单编号", att.ftp_path || '//' || att.attachment_name as "FTP地址", r.approve_time as "生成时间", (case when jt.jt_itemno is null then 'P2' else 'P1' end) as Object_type from mod_workorder w, mod_jt_jobplan_item_relation jt, mod_workorder_tag_proc_info r, mod_attachment att, mod_jobplan_item i, CFG_JOBPLAN P where w.id = r.workorder_id and w.jobitem_id = i.id and p.id = i.jobplan_id and w.id = att.function_def_id2 and w.jobitem_id = jt.jobplan_item_id(+) and r.status = 1 and r.approve_time >=to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND r.approve_time <(to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')+1) and TO_CHAR(P.JOBNO) || TO_CHAR(I.ITEMNO) || w.WORKORDER_NO='${经典案例工单编号}'
